title: Zombie punch
description: This is a great Halloween cocktail recipe with an almost scary amount of booze - sipping required!

To serve: 1 large pumpkin, top removed and flesh and seeds carved out and discarded, optional

steps: Place the brown sugar and the lemon juice into a jug and stir to dissolve.
Place the lemon mixture and all the other ingredients into a large bowl and stir well.
Either serve the punch in the bowl or pour into the hollowed-out pumpkin. Add the lemon and lime pieces and serve.
